query:
ALTER TABLE files 
ADD COLUMN version INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN parentFileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN isCurrent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN replacedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN uploadedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user i7FUhNGQxjduCiw.3c99e327379d --database mQ5aqYpP74zBSbqXk7AHKK --execute ALTER TABLE files 
ADD COLUMN version INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN parentFileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN isCurrent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN replacedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN uploadedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
